text: Ángel Luis Sánchez (born September 20, 1983 in Humacao, Puerto Rico) is a Puerto Rican baseball player. He plays Shortstop for the Houston Astros of Major League Baseball (MLB). Sánchez has formerly played for the Kansas City Royals from 2006-10, the Boston Red Sox and was then traded by the Red Sox to the Houston Astros for Kevin Cash. ==Other websites== *Ángel Sánchez at mlb.com Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican baseball players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Kansas City Royals players
title: Ángel Sánchez (infielder)
